nodes.text: The Gavos Droid Revolution was an uprising of droids on Gavos sometime after the Battle of Yavin, during the Galactic Civil War. It was planned by EV-8D3, an EV-series supervisor droid and figurehead of the New Droids' Rights Movement, in order to spread a violent rebellion against organic life forms throughout the galaxy. The revolution was put down by a group of spacers hired by Bargos the Hutt.
